message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $16,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this lower price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $16,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer but I am still unable to meet you at $13,000. I would like to propose $11,000 as my maximum bid for the product.
